sub_title: Healthcare Consultant - Marketing Manager - Business Developer - Account Manager - Netherlands Status holder 29-07-2025
summary:
Personal and professional development have been the leading aspirations throughout my career thus far, I am a student of science who tends to consistently challenge myself learning new innovative ideas. I have done my bachelor degree in Dentistry from Kabul Medical University (KMU) and I have got my master's degree in healthcare policy innovation and management (HPIM) from Maastricht University of the Netherlands. 
I worked in the ministry of public health in Kabul Afghanistan as Consultant, account manager and researcher and I worked in the Netherlands in Winstar Tandverzorging B.V as marketing manager and business developer. As a passionate student of science I am very much interested in science, innovation and working in healthcare companies. I can speak in seven languages, Dari, Pashtu, Hindi, English, French, German and Dutch. I love playing football, listening to music and reading books.

Now I got the Dutch passport and I am searching for jobs in healthcare, pharmaceutical, medical devices and biotech companies. I am willing to move abroad if I will get a good offer.

education.degree_name: Master of Science (MSc) Healthcare Policy, Innovation & management

profile_positions.description: After succeeding to get the Dutch passport, Now I started learning the Dutch language.
profile_positions.title: Dutch Language Lessons

profile_positions.description:
Project: Trainings of junior medical doctors:

I am experienced in contacting and maintaining long lasting relationship with others, I am a professional communicator with national and international organizations. I can communicate in several languages. I helped the department of ANPHI with new lectures for the junior doctors and healthcare workers to understand the concept of innovation in healthcare.

− Contacting international donors/international agencies to fund the training programs of ANPHI Department 
− Assess, conduct, supervise, monitor and evaluate training activities of ANPHI 
− Develop and update all public health related training in coordination of donors 
− establish cooperation agreements with other similar educational institutions on a national level 
− To design, develop, prepare and organize the delivery of a training needs assessment in ANPHI including effectiveness and cost efficiency of training 
− To explore innovative ideas for helping to build staff capacity building through personal development plans and ideas 
− Reviewing of Training materials such as lectures and references related to public health and management training course
profile_positions.title: Healthcare Consultant and Training Coordinator Ministry of Public Health

profile_positions.description:
Project Radar Dental and Dental expat website:

− Managing all marketing for the company and activities within the marketing department of Radar Dental. 
− Developing the marketing strategy for the company in line with company objectives to better serve dental patients. 
− Coordinating marketing campaigns to find the target group of dental patients. 
− Overseeing the company’s marketing budget for Radar Dental department. 
− Creation and publication of all marketing materials such as flyers in Dutch, English, and Persian- Dari in line with marketing plans. 
− Planning and implementing promotional campaigns for Radar Dental Department to target Persian-Dari and English speaking dental patients. 
− Preparing online scientific dental articles in Facebook Radar Dental page and launching marketing campaigns for Radar Dental Persian-Dari Dental patients. 
− Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing communications. 
− Maintain effective internal communications to ensure that all relevant company functions are kept informed of marketing objectives. 
− Analyzing potential strategic partner relationships for company marketing. 
− Translation of the whole Radar Dental website page into English, and Persian Dari language. 
− Making of a new website in the name of Dental Expat for the Netherlands in the English language. 
− Preparing online scientific dental articles in Radar dental Facebook page and Dental Expat website page. 
− Answering to all the comments of the Facebook page Radar dental 
− Making appointments with Dental patients around Holland for the Radar dental Persian-Dari project
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager and Business Developer by Winstar Tandverzorging - The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
● Research project: LTC (Long-term care) for elderly persons 
● Research topic: How is long-term care for elderly persons managed, financed and provided in the Netherlands, Germany, Sweden, and Spain? A systematic literature review. 
− Reviewing scientific articles in different medical search engines 
− Reading relevant scientific literature and journals 
− Extracting specific information and data 
− Process and analyze results and data
− Present the ongoing research project work and findings to the supervisor of the research project
profile_positions.title: Research Associate in Maastricht University Research Center (Internship)

profile_positions.description:
Project of Hospital Reform:

Working as the first focal point of contact between the embassies/donors and the ministry of public health to receive funding for buying medical devices, medicines for the hospitals of Kabul and provinces. Negotiator and contract maker with pharmaceutical and medical devices companies, in addition responsible for training of doctors in hospitals for usage of medical devices for better service to patients.
1: Buying of medical devices/medicines
2: Different research for WHO and WFP organization
3: Translation of Scientific medical papers 
4: Hospital inspection for the use of medical devices, buying of medical devices/medicines
5: Reporting the Doctors and nurses demands of Kabul Hospitals about the use of the medical devices 
6: Launching training for the use of medical devices in hospitals of Kabul for medical staff
profile_positions.title: Account Manager Medical Devices/Pharmaceutical Companies for the Ministry of Public Health

profile_positions.description: Working as researcher to optimize ministry of public health facility's ability to deliver high-quality care to patients in Kabul hospitals. Responsible for controlling the efficiency and cost-effectiveness of medical devices in the hospitals of Kabul.
profile_positions.title: Healthcare Consultant Ministry of Public Health - Project Hospital Reform
